revised_title: Scientific Observations of the Earthquakes in Manila, July 1880
tldr: This article discusses the earthquakes that occurred in Manila in July 1880. The author, Commander W.B. Pauli, provides a scientific account of the earthquakes, including details on the seismological observations taken at the Municipal Observatory of Manila. The article also covers the volcanic activity in Luzon, the seat of the earthquakes, and the two distinct volcanic systems in the region.
